nodes.text: The worst mistake therefore will be to write them off and giggle at their antics.
The worst mistake would be to perpetuate their impotence and frustration.
If it is a mistake to perpetuate their ignorance and impotence and writing them off and giggling at their antics will do so then it is a mistake to write them off and giggle at their antics
Writing them off and giggling at their antics will perpetuate their impotence and ignorance
It is the very fact that these people are a fringe minority with no capacity to overthrow the government that makes them all the more dangerous.
If it is the fact that they are a fringe minority with no capacity to overthrow the government that makes them all the more dangerous it would be the worst mistake to perpetuate their impotence
Their impotence frustrates them and makes them want to carry out the type of attacks that rocked Gauteng this week.
If their impotence frustrates them and makes them want to carry out the type of attacks that rocked Gauteng this week it is their impotence that makes them all the more dangerous
